Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.loggers

Class NullLogger

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.loggers.BaseLogger
com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.loggers.NullLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger, Listener, MessageTransceiver, Transceiver, Filtered<LogEntry>, Flushable<Duration>, Receiver, Transmitter, Nameable, NamedObject
public class NullLogger extends BaseLogger
A logger that does nothing.

The following code can be used to shut off all logging: 

 LogFactory.factory(NullLogger::new)

Logging

More details about logging are available in kivakit-core.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
